summary: This is an email chain from January 6, 2020, between FBI agents regarding an investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. A case agent in New York seeks to contact a witness located in Sweden for an interview and is coordinating with the FBI's legal attaché in Copenhagen to ensure proper channels are followed.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a subject, along with Ghislaine Maxwell, in an FBI investigation mentioned by a Special Agent from New York.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject, along with Jeffrey Epstein, in an FBI investigation mentioned by a Special Agent from New York.

persons.name: ALAT
persons.context: Added to the email chain by the sender from the FBI's Legat in Copenhagen to assist with contacting a witness in Sweden.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects in the same FBI investigation, indicating a joint investigative focus.

events.title: FBI Coordination for Witness Contact in Sweden
events.description: An FBI Special Agent in New York emails colleagues, including the Legat in Copenhagen, to coordinate the proper channels for contacting a witness in Sweden related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

keyFacts: The FBI was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell as of January 2020, after Epstein's death.
The investigation involved at least one witness located in Sweden whom agents sought to interview.
FBI agents in New York were coordinating with international legal attachés (in Copenhagen) to properly contact foreign witnesses.
The case agent did not have the Swedish witness's address, only a phone number, at the time of the email.
The subject line of the email indicates the investigation involved 'Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking'.
